about.title: About Us
about.p1: Welcome to Random Generator! ğŸ‰ Our mission is to make learning and entertainment fun for everyone. We create a simple platform where you can discover random facts, ask questions, and laugh at jokes.
about.p2: Whether you are a student, parent, or just curious, our platform provides clean, safe, and educational content suitable for all ages. We believe that knowledge and humor should be shared freely and instantly.
about.p3: Our team is passionate about education and creativity. We work to deliver content that sparks curiosity, encourages learning, and brings smiles.
about.p4: Thank you for visiting Random Generator. Keep exploring, keep learning, and keep laughing! ğŸ’¡ğŸ˜‚

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to Random Generator. We value your privacy and want to be transparent about how our service works.

aiService.title: 1. Free AI-Powered Service
aiService.content: Our website provides facts, jokes, and questions that are generated using Artificial Intelligence. The service is completely free to use, and you donâ€™t need to create an account.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We do not collect personal data such as names, emails, or passwords. However, basic analytics (like number of visitors) may be collected to improve the service.

aiContent.title: 3. AI-Generated Content
aiContent.content: All jokes, facts, and questions are created using AI. Since the content is machine-generated, we cannot guarantee 100% accuracy. Please use the content for fun and entertainment purposes only.

license.title: 4. MIT License
license.content: This project is released under the MIT License. You are free to use, modify, and share the code and content with proper attribution.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party tools (like Google Analytics or AdSense) to support the service. These services may use cookies to provide better functionality and ads.

updates.title: 6. Updates
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any updates will be posted on this page with a new date of revision.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to Random Generator. By accessing or using our service, you agree to the following Terms & Conditions.

freeService.title: 1. Free Service
freeService.content: Our platform is completely free to use. You can generate jokes, facts, and questions without creating an account.

aiContent.title: 2. AI-Generated Content
aiContent.content: All content (facts, jokes, questions) is generated by Artificial Intelligence. We cannot guarantee that the content is always accurate, appropriate, or error-free. Use it for fun and entertainment purposes only.

liability.title: 3. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We are not responsible for any misuse, misunderstanding, or damages caused by using our service or the AI-generated content.

license.title: 4. MIT License
license.content: This project is released under the MIT License. You are free to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the software, provided that the copyright notice and permission are included in all copies.

licenseSimplified.title: MIT License (Simplified)
licenseSimplified.content: Permission is granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files, to deal in the software without restriction.

updates.title: 5. Updates
updates.content: We may update these Terms & Conditions at any time. Any updates will be posted here with a new revision date.
